title: Ather Energy aims to raise market share with foray into family scooter segment
description: Electric two-wheeler maker Ather Energy aims to boost its market share as it expands into the family scooter segment, according to a company official. The Bengaluru-based company has so far focused on manufacturing sporty scooters.
